# HandSkeleton

**Structure**

A collection of joints in a hand.

## Declaration

```swift
struct HandSkeleton
```

## Retrieving specific hand joints

- **joint(_:)**: Retrieves a hand joint based on the joint name you specify.
- **HandSkeleton.Joint**: The name and position of an individual hand joint.
- **HandSkeleton.JointName**: The names of different hand joints.

## Inspecting hand skeletons

- **allJoints**: All of the joints in a hand skeleton.
- **neutralPose**: A hand pose that you can use as a reference.
- **description**: A textual representation of this Skeleton.

## Hand tracking

- **Happy Beam**: Leverage a Full Space to create a fun game using ARKit.
- **HandTrackingProvider**: A source of live data about the position of a person’s hands and hand joints.
- **HandAnchor**: A hand’s position in a person’s surroundings.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
